docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 11. -- The Chaco peace conference was formally organized late this afternoon. Foreign Minister Carlos Saavedra Lamas of Argentina presided. Brazil, Chile, Peru and Uruguay were represented by their Ambassadors here and the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 11. -- The Chaco peace conference was formally organized late this afternoon. Foreign Minister Carlos Saavedra Lamas of Argentina presided. Brazil, Chile, Peru and Uruguay were represented by their Ambassadors here and the United States by Charge d' Affaires Raymond Cox.
docs.abstract: conf formally organized in Buenos Aires; Uruguay joins

headline.main: CHACO MEDIATORS ASK BELLIGERENTS' VIEWS; Conferees Organize and Query Bolivia and Paraguay on Terms to Halt Fighting.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: One of the largest salvaging projects to be undertaken by a group of private citizens acting, however, with the moral support of the United States Government, is now well under way. The Foreign Bondholders Protective Council, representing the...
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the largest salvaging projects to be undertaken by a group of private citizens acting, however, with the moral support of the United States Government, is now well under way. The Foreign Bondholders Protective Council, representing the thousands of American investors who purchased foreign dollar bonds either issued or guaranteed by foreign governments or their political subdivisions, is pushing plans to effect settlements with many debtors whose obligations have gone into default.
docs.abstract: Table showing price range of 15 foreign dollar bond issues for 1935

headline.main: DOLLAR-BOND DRIVE FOR SALVAGE GAINS; War Rumors and Difficulty of Transfers of Funds Hinder Protective Council.

docs.snippet: Net profit of the Columbia Pictures Corporation for the nine months ended on March 30 amounted to $1,572,720 after Federal taxes and all other charges. This was equivalent, after dividend requirements on the $3 convertible preference stock, to $8.62...
docs.lead_paragraph: Net profit of the Columbia Pictures Corporation for the nine months ended on March 30 amounted to $1,572,720 after Federal taxes and all other charges. This was equivalent, after dividend requirements on the $3 convertible preference stock, to $8.62 a share on 177,933 shares of common stock outstanding.

headline.main: COLUMBIA PICTURES DOUBLES EARNINGS; 9 Month Profit of $1,572,720 Compares With $739,338 in Previous Period.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 4. -- The United States has at last recaptured its lost leadership in the South American markets after steadily losing ground for nearly five years. The speed and huge volume of the American come-back make it one of the most...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 4. -- The United States has at last recaptured its lost leadership in the South American markets after steadily losing ground for nearly five years. The speed and huge volume of the American come-back make it one of the most remarkable trade recoveries in recent years.

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICA AGAIN IS 'BUYING AMERICAN'; Our Exporters Are Rapidly Regaining Their Markets in the Specialties Which Others Cannot Offer
